Huh. @FidoSolutions can't figure out why I can't log in to the Fido website.
@FidoSolutions You won't tell me why you want this information. You cannot need it to verify me if you have nothing to verify it against.
@FidoSolutions You did. Not usefully, though. Why do you need new personal information that I have never before provided to "verify" me?
@FidoSolutions You cannot validate my identity with this information, as you have nothing to validate against. I have never provided it.
Why does @FidoSolutions want new personal information from me to help with my old account?
Now @FidoSolutions wants my birthdate, which I have never provided. To ID me? How many people with my name *and phone number* are on file?
To solve my problem of being unable to log in to their website, @FidoSolutions wants me to log in to their website and fill out a form.
